title: Lasha Lomidze
text:
Lasha Lomidze (born 30 June 1992) is a Georgian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. His position is <a href="Number%208%20%28rugby%20union%29">number 8</a>, and he currently plays for <a href="London%20Irish">London Irish</a> in the <a href="English%20Premiership%20%28rugby%20union%29">English Premiership</a> and the <a href="Georgia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Georgia national team</a>.
Biography.
Lasha Lomidze was formed in <a href="Montpellier%20H%C3%A9rault%20Rugby">Montpellier</a>. He made no appearances for the first team during his time at the club, but he was a part of Montpellier's Under-23 side that became the "champion de France Espoirs" in May 2013. During the summer of 2014, he signed for <a href="AS%20B%C3%A9ziers%20H%C3%A9rault">AS Béziers Hérault</a>.
Lasha Lomidze was in the <a href="Georgia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Georgian squad</a> for <a href="2015%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2015 Rugby World Cup</a>.
On 1 June 2017, he signed for <a href="English%20Premiership%20%28rugby%20union%29">English Premiership</a> club <a href="London%20Irish">London Irish</a>.
